summary: Phase 1 progress: Completed 7 sorries (11->4). Proved buildSeedAux_preserves_mem_general fully (10/10 cases). Proved buildSeed_contains_formula for all 6 recursive cases (box, all_future, all_past, neg_box, neg_G, neg_H). Build passes with 0 errors, 4 sorries remaining.

completion_data.completion_summary: Significant Phase 1 progress: eliminated 7 sorries (11->4). Key blocking lemmas buildSeedAux_preserves_mem_general and buildSeed_contains_formula now proven. Remaining work is multi-formula foldl lemmas.
